sentences.sContent: Please keep the doors closed while the train is moving.
sentences.sCn: 火车行驶时请保持车门关闭。

sentences.sContent: ‘Come on,’ Sue said. No one moved.
Could you move your car, please? It’s blocking the road.
sentences.sCn: 你能把车挪一下吗？挡着路了。

sentences.sContent: Becca moved down the steps and into the yard.
sentences.sCn: 贝卡走下台阶，来到院子里。

sentences.sContent: The bar was so crowded you could hardly move .
sentences.sCn: 酒吧很挤，人都难以挪动。

sentences.sContent: At Christmas, you couldn’t move for toys in this house (= there were a lot of toys ) .
sentences.sCn: 圣诞节的时候，这房子里玩具多得让人都挪不开步。

sentences.sContent: Paul couldn’t move a muscle (= could not move at all ) – he was so scared.
sentences.sCn: 保罗动弹不得——他吓坏了。

phrases.pCn: 在活动中，在进行中；四处奔波
向前移动，提步向前；向前发展
使从…中醒悟过来；从…搬走，离开…
v. 走来走去；绕着……来回转
往里走；继续向前或后移动

words.tran: 动产的；可移动的；不固定的
原动力；鼓动者；搬运公司；搬家工人
移动，移动到；感动（move的过去式，过去分词）

trans.tranOther: to change from one place or position to another, or to make something do this
